name: Dicey Roller
description:
CONTROLS

WASD - move

SPACE - dodge roll

Mouse - click buttons

R - restart

The number rolled dictates the effect of the next time you roll.

Number Guide

1 - Stops yourself for a short time

2 - Slows yourself for a short time

3 - Slash left or right

4 - Weighted shockwave around player

5 - Throw cards left or right

6 - Nothing...???

I had free time so I decided to join the jam, don't expect too much cause I don't make games. I did have fun making it though.
